sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="500">
    <v-list>
      <v-list-item-group v-model="model">
        <v-list-item v-for="(task, i) in task" :key="i">
          <v-list-item-icon>
            <v-icon v-text="task.icon"></v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-title v-text="task.name"></v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-item-group>
    </v-list>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
  import axios from "axios";

  export default {
    data: () => ({
      tasks: [],
      access_token: "",
      client: "",
      uid: "",
      errorMessage: "",
    }),
    async mounted() {
      this.access_token = this.$cookies.get("access-token");
      this.client = this.$cookies.get("client");
      this.uid = this.$cookies.get("uid");
      await this.getTasks();
    },
    methods: {
      async getTasks() {
        axios
          .get("/api/v1/tasks", {
            headers: {
              "access-token": this.access_token,
              client: this.client,
              uid: this.uid,
            },
          })
          .then((response) => {
            console.log(response);
            this.tasks = response.data.data;
            console.log(this.tasks);
          })
          .catch((error) => {
            console.error(error);
            console.error(error.response);
            this.errorMessage = error.response.data.errors[0];
            console.error(this.errorMessage);
          });
      },
    },
  };
</script>
